title: Installing Question
body: Im trying to install LoL and its just stops at 78% (I'm on a mac) i have my firewall disabled and everything idk what the problem is

replies.body: At this period in the patcher, files are being downloading and updated.  It looks like you might be having an issue maintaiing a connection to the patching server to download these files.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this.  Make sure to select Mac options for instructions specific to your operating system.  Hope that helps!
